overview: Dark X is proud to present Black and Blonde featuring a bevy of blonde beauties taking on the biggest and the best BBC's. Featuring stunning cover girl Alexa Grace, the buxom Kagney Linn Karter (anal), lithe newcomer Elsa Jean, and full bottomed Trillium (taking on Mandingo) in a heated pairing you won't want to miss.
title: Black and Blonde
